item.title: NixOS Contributions
item.description: I started using NixOS as my primary operating system in late 2021. As I was migrating my dotfiles for NixOS, some packages I wanted to use were missing from the NixOS package collection, Nixpkgs. Therefore, I contributed the following package definitions to Nixpkgs: d0c-s4vage/lookatme: An interactive, terminal-based markdown presenter. View Pull Request sindrets/winshift.nvim: Rearrange Neovim windows with ease. View Pull Request skywind3000/asyncrun.vim: Run async tasks in Vim/NeoVim and output to quickfix list.
